title: Judge To Exonerate 'Friendship 9' Activists 54 Years After Arrest
teaser: The "Friendship Nine" were college students arrested for a sit-in at a South Carolina lunch counter in 1961. A judge is set to clear them of a five-decades-old trespassing conviction.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
